name: New-menu-adder-remover
tagline: Add and Remove files from the New menu
body: #New menu adder and remover This is a program that will add and remove files from the Windows New menu. ####Installation Use `git clone https://github.com/karstenes/New-Menu-adder-remover.git` to install ####Usage To use, run either the add or remove batch files.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
